name: algebra.js
description: Build, display, and solve algebraic equations.

scripts.minify: npm run-script bundle && uglifyjs --mangle --beautify ascii_only=true,beautify=false build/algebra-%npm_package_version%.js -o build/algebra-%npm_package_version%.min.js
scripts.sync: npm run-script minify && git checkout gh-pages && cp build/*.min.js javascripts && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Nicole White
